title: 'Game-Changer for My Home Office: Height-Adjustable Motorized Ergonomic Table'
body: Rating: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5/5)  As someone who spends long hours working from home, investing in a height-adjustable motorized ergonomic table has been an absolute game-changer for my productivity and overall well-being. I've been using this table for a few months now, and it has exceeded my expectations in every way.  Design and Build Quality (5/5): The first thing that impressed me was the table's sleek and modern design. It seamlessly fits into any office or home decor. The build quality is exceptional – it feels sturdy and well-constructed. The motorized components operate smoothly and quietly, which is essential when I'm on video calls or need to adjust my desk height during a meeting.  Ergonomics (5/5): This table's ergonomic design has significantly improved my comfort during long workdays. The height adjustability feature allows me to switch between sitting and standing positions effortlessly. I've noticed a considerable reduction in back and neck pain since I started using this table. The customizable height presets are a fantastic feature that lets me switch between my preferred sitting and standing heights with a single touch.  Ease of Use (5/5): Operating the motorized system is a breeze. With the included control panel, I can adjust the height to my liking with just a touch of a button. The table also comes with a smartphone app that allows for remote adjustments, which is incredibly convenient when I'm away from my desk. The setup process was straightforward, and I appreciated the clear and concise user manual.  Versatility (5/5): This table offers versatility like no other. I use it not only for work but also as a multipurpose surface for various tasks. Whether it's crafting, writing, or even having a meal, this table accommodates my needs effortlessly. The large surface area provides ample space for my dual monitors, keyboard, and other peripherals.  Durability (5/5): After several months of daily use, this table still looks and functions like new. It has proven to be a durable and reliable addition to my home office setup. The materials used in its construction appear to be of high quality, and I expect it to last for years to come.  Price (4/5): While this table is not the cheapest option on the market, the benefits it brings to my health and productivity are well worth the investment. It's an investment in my well-being, and I believe it pays for itself in terms of increased efficiency and reduced discomfort.  In conclusion, the height-adjustable motorized ergonomic table has transformed my workspace and improved my overall quality of life. It's a well-designed, versatile, and easy-to-use piece of furniture that I wholeheartedly recommend to anyone in need of a comfortable and adaptable workspace. Whether you work from home or have a traditional office, this table is a worthwhile addition that can make a significant difference in your daily routine.

title: Don't Buy: Poor quality with manufacturing defects and very bad customer support
body: 'I am utterly disappointed with the "White Mulberry Motorized Height Adjustable Sit-Stand Desk" purchased from Amazon for a hefty price of 20K rupees. The product they dispatched was riddled with manufacturing defects
column5: rendering it virtually unusable. My attempts to seek redress through customer support were an exercise in frustration. After numerous follow-up calls
column6: I finally received a WhatsApp call from their so-called technical team. Their lack of expertise was glaring
column7: and their sluggish response time further exacerbated my dissatisfaction. The prospect of waiting an additional 5 days for a replacement part is ludicrous
column8: highlighting their lack of quality control. As a freelance web designer
column9: their abysmal customer support and tardiness have cost me time and money
column10: including an additional 748 rupees paid to a carpenter for a futile visit. This is unequivocally a subpar product that I vehemently advise against purchasing.'

title: 'Insist on a installation manual as the installation video is inadequate'
body: All's well that ends well. Today we could finally set up the table after around three weeks of ordering it( inspite of being an Amazon Prime member )and very happy with the result. The table is sturdy and the height-adjustment feature is indeed its Unique Selling Proposition . Two major tips. Don't try to assemble without an installation manual ( they don't provide one with the product and you have to ask for it). Second , keep a normal screwdriver handy as you will need it to make holes for fixing the height adjustment lever( they provide an alignment key but that is inadequate for this purpose).The package has a number of labeled plastic pouches with different screws . The installation video has no reference to these pouches marked A,B, etc. Like us if you try to use the screws without having access to the installation manual there is a fat chance that you will damage the table top or damage the holes for screws already provided on the table. Worse, in our case the height-adjustable lever was defective as it wouldn't go in to the groove. Although Amazon refused to replace the defective product the manufacturer agreed to do so . The company people are however very nice and helpful. In the unlikely situation that your table needs to be replaced, insist on the company not to send the replacement table by Bluedart( as in our case it took almost a week from Mumbai to Kolkata although the defective table was collected and delivered to the manufacturer in 3-4 days time). Coming back to be table it looks classy with its black colour( although it is called White Mulberry!) And I would recommend it as long as you take the precautions given above. You will need about 30 minutes to assemble it.
